attributes.action: Smart Phone gambling apps to Children - BAN THEM
attributes.additional_details: Smart Phone gambling apps to Children - BAN THEM. Facebook have started placing unrequested sponsored Gambling Apps on Smart Phones, these include to Children. These should be banned completely by the UK government as they are designed to attract all phone users to gamble including millions of children. There is no way to disable or delete them and if pressed they automatically take you to install the Gambling App. They should be banned completely.
